item.title: GKE Audit logs - Find the cluster resources audit logs
item.description: Introduction In a scenario where you need to validate the creator of a specific Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) cluster, especially when there is no clear ownership or standard naming conventions, leveraging the Google Logging Console can provide valuable insights. This guide aims to demonstrate how you can utilize Google Cloud’s Logging Console to identify the creator of a GKE cluster. Commands The following command is designed to be executed in the Cloud Logging console.
